Description: A foreign key that refers to a standard concept identifier in the Standardized Vocabularies for the vocabulary the Vocabulary record belongs to.
A unique identifier for each vocabulary.
The name describing the vocabulary, for example "SNOMED-CT", "ICD-9", "Visit", etc.
